Cherrycake\DatabaseRow::getField

getField

Returns the value of the specified field on the row. If $fields is specified, the returned data is treated accordingly.

    Signature

    public function getField(The $key, [boolean $fields = false] )

    Parameters

    $key — object
    key of the field


    $fields — boolean
    An optional array definition of fields and their types

    Returns

    mixed
    The value of the field
